Package com.okta.shiro.realm

Class OktaResourceServerRealm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.shiro.realm.CachingRealm
      • org.apache.shiro.realm.AuthenticatingRealm
        • org.apache.shiro.realm.AuthorizingRealm
          • com.okta.shiro.realm.OktaResourceServerRealm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.shiro.authc.LogoutAware, org.apache.shiro.authz.Authorizer, org.apache.shiro.authz.permission.PermissionResolverAware, org.apache.shiro.authz.permission.RolePermissionResolverAware, org.apache.shiro.cache.CacheManagerAware, org.apache.shiro.realm.Realm, org.apache.shiro.util.Initializable, org.apache.shiro.util.Nameable
    public class OktaResourceServerRealm
extends org.apache.shiro.realm.AuthorizingRealm
    A Realm implementation that parses and validate Okta JWT Access Tokens.

    NOTE: This realm MUST be use with the Shiro Bearer Token Filter authcBearer

    This realm has the following properites:

    • issuer: (required) this must be set to your Okta issuer URL, e.g. https://dev-123456.okta.com/oauth2/default
    • audience: (defaults to api://default) This value must match the audience of your Authorization Server
    • groupClaim: (defaults to groups) If the JWT access token has a list of strings in this claim, they will be mapped to Shiro Roles
    • nameClaim: (defaults to sub) this JWT claim value will be used for the security principal name
    Since:
    0.1.0
    See Also:
    Shiro Default Filters
